data.question: What is the dominant source of electricity in the United States?
What is the target capture rate of CO2 from natural gas flue streams set by the U.S. Department of Energy?
What is the main challenge in separating CO2 from natural gas flue emissions?
data.answer: The low partial pressure of CO2 in the flue stream

data.question: What type of frameworks were reported to exhibit two-step cooperative CO2 adsorption?
What is the purpose of tetraamine-functionalized frameworks in carbon capture?
data.answer: To retain cooperativity leading to exceptional efficiency in capturing CO2

data.question: Is steam used for CO2 recovery in tetraamine-functionalized Mg2(dobpdc) considered cost-effective?
What is the CO2 concentration typically found in natural gas combined-cycle (NGCC) emissions?
Do aqueous amine solutions have high CO2 cycling capacities?
What mechanism do tetraamine-functionalized frameworks use for CO2 adsorption?
data.answer: A two-step ammonium carbamate chain-formation mechanism

data.question: Are tetraamine-functionalized frameworks stable to adsorption-desorption cycling with simulated humid flue gas?
What is the main mature technology for carbon capture as of the article's publication?
Can Mg2(dobpdc)(3-4-3) reduce the CO2 content in an NGCC flue stream to 0.4%?
What is the role of water in the CO2 capture process using Mg2(dobpdc)(3-4-3)?
data.answer: Water enhances CO2 binding in the material

data.question: Is the CO2 adsorption capacity of Mg2(dobpdc)(3-3-3) stable over time?
What is the main advantage of using steam for CO2 desorption in Mg2(dobpdc)(3-4-3)?
data.answer: It could afford substantial energy savings compared with traditional processes

data.question: What is the theoretical capacity of CO2 molecules per tetraamine in Mg2(dobpdc) frameworks?
Does the presence of O2 and water in NGCC emissions affect the performance of CO2 capture technologies?
What is the main drawback of aqueous amine solutions in carbon capture?
data.answer: Susceptibility to oxidative and thermal degradation

data.question: Can Mg2(dobpdc)(3-4-3) achieve a 90% CO2 capture rate from NGCC flue emissions?
What is the significance of the ordered, multimetal coordination in tetraamine-functionalized frameworks?
data.answer: It markedly increases the stability of these adsorbents
